description: Creator of "Operation Undershaft", a plan to `tame Koko Hekmatyar` and gain access to HCLI`s enormous logistics network. R and Hex`s superior. He is a man with many aliases and is most commonly known as "Bookman". He was addressed as "Burattinaio" (puppeteer) during his time in Bosnia. R calls him "Saw", but George refuses to be called that after R`s death.
name: Bookman
